pullRequest.title: Port to maintained 3rd party diffutils
pullRequest.bodyText:
Pull Request template
Purpose / Description
Our diff utils for the type answer feature is unmaintained, I want to use a maintained dependency
Fixes
Fixes #6537
Approach
A pretty straight-forward port to the new library's APIs.
How Has This Been Tested?
Tested in API29 emulator, works for fully correct, partially correct, or missing answer parts
Learning (optional, can help others)
I don't think I learned a single thing making this PR.
Checklist

 You have not changed whitespace unnecessarily (it makes diffs hard to read)
 You have a descriptive commit message with a short title (first line, max 50 chars).
 Your code follows the style of the project (e.g. never omit braces in if statements)
 You have commented your code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
 You have performed a self-review of your own code

nodes.bodyText: How was a change previously represented, and is this a functional change?
